text: Beaujeu is a commune in the Alpes-de-Haute-Provence department in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region of south-eastern France. == Hamlets == * Boullard * le Clucheret * l'Escale * Fonfrède * le Labouret * Saint-Pierre * les Traverses-Hautes * le Villard == References == Category:Communes in Alpes- de-Haute-Provence
title: Beaujeu, Alpes-de-Haute-Provence
